author: cutting
msg: Merge -r 540358:540359 from trunk to 0.13 branch.  Fixes: HADOOP-1386.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1386.  Fix Path to not permit the empty string as a path, as this has lead to accidental file deletion.  Instead force applications to use '.' to name the default directory.  Contributed by Hairong.

author: taylor
msg: Fix bug in JSF Bridge for Maven-2 build where the JSF configuration file was not being copied

author: mturyn
msg: Made splitter sizers only headerTable in height, but kept moving sizer full height
(since we can't show the columns themselves moving).  Many small changes to support
this, including coding to suppress sizer flashing, and clean-up.
